name: React / React Native Developer (Limassol)
description:
We are looking for a React/React Native Developer in Limassol, Cyprus.

Responsibilities and top priorities:

  • Upgrading the design of the entire application (mobile & web) with the addition of the functionality
  • Dividing front-end into packets or modules
  • Layouts for mobile applications

Requirements:

  • At least 2 years of experience of working with React, ReactNative, TypeScript
  • We use our own component library
  • Adaptive web design for mobile and web applications specific to platforms and browsers
  • Flex layout
  • CSS-in-JS
  • Git 3
  • ES6, ES2015, ES7
  • HTML, CSS
  • Fluent Russian and Intermediate English

We offer:

  • Attractive monthly salary paid in line with your skills and experience
  • A comfortable office in the center of Limassol (Cyprus)
  • Medical insurance for our employees and their families
  • Access to professional training, conferences, and paid educational courses
  • Corporate language courses (English, Greek)
  • Evening yoga classes in office relaxation space
  • Subsidized lunches
  • Different corporate events for employees and their children
  • Sports events
  • Assistance in relocation and visa processing (if necessary)
